message: Hello?
Hi, you've reached the DVLA, how can I help?
Yeah need to update my address on my license.
Okay, what's your full name please?
Silvester Alexander.
And your date of birth?
It's the...3rd of November 1982.
Thanks. And can I get the license number from your current driving license?
Uh...yeah hang on, let me find it...
Bloody thing's buried in my wallet somewhere...
No problem, take your time.
Got it! Okay, it starts S, M, I, T...
Apologies, could you use the phonetic alphabet please? It makes it easier to get the right letters.
Oh right, sure...Sierra, Mountain, Indigo, Tango, Eight Two Five, One Six Three, Alpha Alpha, Niner Niner, Bravo X-ray.
Got it, thanks. Just to confirm, that's SMIT825163AA99BX?
Yep, that's the one.
Great, and what's the new address you need to update to?
It's 48 Sycamore Road, Birmingham, B16 8LR.
Okay let me repeat that back - 48 Sycamore Road...
Yeah that's right.
And the postcode was B16 8LR?
Correct, B16 8LR in Birmingham.
Perfect, thanks for confirming. Let me get this updated...
Apologies for the short delay. I've updated your new Birmingham address on the system.
Brilliant, so that's all sorted then?
Not quite, as you've updated your address, we'll need to issue you a new driving license document with the new details.
Oh I see...how much is the fee for a replacement license then?
There's no fee required in this case sir. When you're just updating your address details and haven't lost your current license, we'll reissue it for free.
Really? That's great, I thought I'd have to pay.
No charge at all. We'll print a new license with the Birmingham address and send it out to you in the next 1-2 weeks.
Ah perfect, that makes sense. Thanks for explaining that process.
You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist with regarding your driving license today?
Actually yeah, one other quick thing...
Sure, go ahead.
How long is the new license actually valid for? My current one expires in 2026 I think.
Okay, let me just check the expiry date on your current license...
According to our records, your license is due to expire on 12th July 2026.
Ah ok, so not long left then. The new one you send will be valid for another 10 years from that expiry date?
No. The replacement license will have the same expiry date of 12/07/2026, but with your new Birmingham address printed on it.
Brilliant, that clarifies it. You've been really helpful, thanks.
It's my pleasure, I'm glad I could explain everything clearly for you. Have a great rest of your day!
You too, cheers, bye!
Goodbye.
